com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.combat.threat

Class FragmentSwarmHullmod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.BaseHullMod
      • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.combat.threat.FragmentSwarmHullmod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HullModEffect

    public class FragmentSwarmHullmod
extends BaseHullMod
    Hullmod that creates a fragment swarm around the ship. This swarm is required to power "fragment" weapons.

      • applyEffectsAfterShipCreation

        public void applyEffectsAfterShipCreation(ShipAPI ship,
                                          java.lang.String id)
        Description copied from interface: HullModEffect
        Effects applied here should NOT affect ship stats as this does not get called from the campaign. Apply stat changes in applyEffectsBeforeShipCreation() instead, as that does affect the campaign.
        Specified by:
        applyEffectsAfterShipCreation in interface HullModEffect
